items: 11 Signature Components exported from npm library: GlitchText, DiamondLoader, TacticalPanel, HoloCard, DataStream, TacticalBadge, WarningBanner, ScanDivider, CoordinateTag, RadarChart, HUDOverlay
Dependency cleanup — 7 docs-only packages (i18next, shiki, react-router-dom, etc.) moved to devDependencies
framer-motion and lucide-react added as optional peer dependencies
89 tests passing across 4 test files — 86.69% statement coverage
GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline — lint, typecheck, test, build on every push
README updated with value proposition, Signature Components API table, and peer deps guide
Initial npm library release — Tooltip, Toast, Toaster, SonnerToaster, cn(), useToast()
CSS design token system with ef-* color palette and surface-* layering
Tailwind CSS preset exported as reend-components/tailwind
Documentation site launch with Sci-Fi Industrial Futurism theme
Shiki syntax highlighting, interactive playgrounds, fuzzy search (⌘K)
